mapper.select: SELECT ec.id,ec.title,ec.cover,ec.lesson_num AS lessonNum,ec.price, es1.title AS subjectLevelOne, es2.title AS subjectLevelTwo, et.name AS teacherName FROM edu_course ec LEFT OUTER JOIN edu_subject es1 ON ec.subject_parent_id=es1.id LEFT OUTER JOIN edu_subject es2 ON ec.subject_id=es2.id LEFT OUTER JOIN edu_teacher et ON ec.teacher_id=et.id WHERE ec.id=#{courseId}

SELECT ec.id,ec.title,ec.cover,ec.lesson_num AS lessonNum,ec.price, ec.buy_count AS buyCount,ec.view_count AS viewCount, ecd.description, et.id AS teacherId,et.name AS teacherName,et.intro,et.avatar, es1.title AS subjectLevelOne,es1.id AS subjectLevelOneId, es2.title AS subjectLevelTwo,es2.id AS subjectLevelTwoId FROM edu_course ec LEFT OUTER JOIN edu_subject es1 ON ec.subject_parent_id=es1.id LEFT OUTER JOIN edu_subject es2 ON ec.subject_id=es2.id LEFT OUTER JOIN edu_teacher et ON ec.teacher_id=et.id LEFT OUTER JOIN edu_course_description ecd ON ec.id=ecd.id WHERE ec.id=#{courseId}
